Лучшая игра своих лет! удивляет и в 2019 году, графика кажется современной и по сей день! покупайте не задумывайтесь , и проникнитесь сюжетом динамичной игры!!!
Un classico, must-have per tutti gli amanti degli fps insieme ad ogni altro capitolo o dlc della serie

[h1] Короче говоря [/h1]
Одна из лучших игр по погружению. Музыка просто прекрасна. Графика и сейчас очень крутая, а на 2004 год. УУУУУФФФФФ! Это было просто нереально. Физика в этой игре как полноценный игровой элемент. Стрельба офигенная. Сюжет - хороший.

[h1] Моя оценка [/h1]
10 из 10. Одна из лучших игр, в которую я играл.

[h1] Если хотите по подробнее ознакомиться с игрой, то настоятельно рекомендую посмотреть обзор от моего друга. Здесь всё ясно рассказано. [/h1]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QqPEgnXr_tI
Всем хорошего дня)

Who's here after the new Half Life was announced?

I guess this might be a good time to post this review, since [b] Half-Life: Alyx [/b] was just unveiled. If you haven't played this game (who's kidding, you probably have) you need to do so. It's aged incredibly well for a game released in 2004, and still has great play value in the modern gaming world. It's so good, that I honestly don't know if any HL game after this will ever be able to compare, but I am hoping.

tl;dr PLAY THIS GAME
one of the best FPS games
it might be old but it is amazingly good

Really one of the best games ever released, and the game is so good that it still sells. It's a great multiplatform game including Linux, I'm one of the fans and I've always been waiting for episode 3.

Great game, stunning graphics for 15 years old.  Facial animations rock for its age.  Very fun, ended up playing for about 12 hours straight at one point.

Quase tão bom quanto o primeiro. Só não é melhor por não ser uma inovação em tecnologia tão forte quando foi o seu antecessor. Porém, a física desse jogo é tão boa, que serve de referência para muitos títulos até hoje.

half life 2'yi  bu yıl ilk defa oynadım ve bahsedildiği kadar iyi  olmadığını gördüm gelmiş geçmiş en iyi oyun ödülü alabilecek bir seviyede değil gözümde hikayesi de beni fazla etkilemedi bir unsur hariç g-man , g-man şu ana kadar yazılmış en iyi karakterlerden biri spoiler vermemek adına daha fazla konuşmicam bence oyun efsane değil indirim döneminde alınabilir ortalamanın biraz üstü bir oyun

One of the best classic FPS games ever made!!!

I started playing half life 2 in 2012 on my 360 when i was 9 not knowing what it half life was. All i knew was TF2 and the multiplayer was dead at the time so i played half life 2 and loved it but i never beat it only made it to route kanal. When i got into pc gaming in 2015 first thing i bought was the orange box and a l4d bundle. I never beat it then because i couldn't get into nova prospekt. No matter how many time i replayed the game id either get stuck in the antlion beach or die getting to nova prospekt. I finally beat it and it is one of the best fps games ive ever played and recommend it to anyone hopeing to get into pc gaming.
I'ts awesome, fun and broken. PLAY IT NOW!

Truly a piece of art. You can't call yourself a pc gamer if you haven't completed HL2

This game paved the way for most modern games of it's genre. Even though the game is over 15 years old(at the time of writing this), it's graphics and physics still impress me. Even though support for this game virtually halted, it's still stable enough to play normally. I definitely recommend this game. 
 
WARNING: The last game in this series ends on a cliff-hangar. A completion to the story is currently being developed by the community.
